title: Spring Arbor University Hosts a Copy of the Saint John’s Bible (Spring Arbor University)
text: ( Source : Spring Arbor University ) Spring Arbor University has the privilege of hosting one of the few Heritage Editions of The Saint John's Bible . The Bible arrived August 15 , 2015 , kicking off a full year of events, public readings, visio
